news_header: A PSA Airlines plane collided with a military helicopter in Washington, resulting in at least 18 fatalities.
news_original_title: Matkustajakoneen ja helikopterin törmäys näkyy videolla
news_text: A PSA Airlines-operated passenger plane crashed into a military helicopter in Washington, D.C., leading to at least 18 deaths. The incident occurred while the plane was landing at Ronald Reagan National Airport, with about 60 passengers and four crew members on board. The helicopter, belonging to the military, was on a training flight with three soldiers. Rescue operations are complicated by cold water and darkness. President Trump commented on the accident, suggesting it could have been prevented. There were no known Finnish nationals involved.
